mapper.select: SELECT ROLE_ID, TENANT_ID, ROLE_NAME, DISPLAY_NAME, DESCRIPTION, PRIORITY, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_AT FROM AUTH_ROLES WHERE ROLE_ID = #{roleId}
SELECT ROLE_ID, TENANT_ID, ROLE_NAME, DISPLAY_NAME, DESCRIPTION, PRIORITY, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_AT FROM AUTH_ROLES WHERE ROLE_NAME = #{roleName} AND TENANT_ID = #{tenantId}

SELECT ROLE_ID, TENANT_ID, ROLE_NAME, DISPLAY_NAME, DESCRIPTION, PRIORITY, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_AT FROM AUTH_ROLES WHERE TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} ORDER BY PRIORITY ASC, ROLE_NAME ASC
